trans-unit.source: Build an HBase application using Maven | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Build an HBase application using Maven | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Apache Maven to build a Java-based Apache HBase application, then deploy it to Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Apache Maven to build a Java-based Apache HBase application, then deploy it to Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create and build an <linkText>Apache HBase</linkText><title></title> application in Java by using Apache Maven.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create and build an <linkText>Apache HBase</linkText><title></title> application in Java by using Apache Maven.

trans-unit.source: Then use the application with Azure HDInsight (Hadoop).
trans-unit.target: Then use the application with Azure HDInsight (Hadoop).

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Maven</linkText><title></title> is a software project management and comprehension tool that allows you to build software, documentation, and reports for Java projects.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Maven</linkText><title></title> is a software project management and comprehension tool that allows you to build software, documentation, and reports for Java projects.

trans-unit.source: In this article, you will learn how to use it to create a basic Java application that that creates, queries, and deletes an HBase table on an Azure HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you will learn how to use it to create a basic Java application that that creates, queries, and deletes an HBase table on an Azure HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Java platform JDK</linkText><title></title> 7 or later
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Java platform JDK</linkText><title></title> 7 or later

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Maven</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Maven</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: <linkText>An Azure HDInsight cluster with HBase</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>An Azure HDInsight cluster with HBase</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: From the command-line in your development environment, change directories to the location where you want to create the project, for example, cd code\hdinsight.
trans-unit.target: From the command-line in your development environment, change directories to the location where you want to create the project, for example, cd code\hdinsight.

trans-unit.source: Use the mvn command, which is installed with Maven, to generate the scaffolding for the project.
trans-unit.target: Use the mvn command, which is installed with Maven, to generate the scaffolding for the project.

trans-unit.source: This creates a new directory in the current directory, with the name specified by the artifactID parameter (hbaseapp in this example.)
trans-unit.target: This creates a new directory in the current directory, with the name specified by the artifactID parameter (hbaseapp in this example.)

trans-unit.source: This directory will contain the following items:
trans-unit.target: This directory will contain the following items:

trans-unit.source: pom.xml: The Project Object Model (POM) contains information and configuration details used to build the project.
trans-unit.target: pom.xml: The Project Object Model (POM) contains information and configuration details used to build the project.

trans-unit.source: src: The directory that contains the main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory, where you will author the application.
trans-unit.target: src: The directory that contains the main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory, where you will author the application.

trans-unit.source: Delete the src\test\java\com\microsoft\examples\apptest.java file because it will not be used in this example.
trans-unit.target: Delete the src\test\java\com\microsoft\examples\apptest.java file because it will not be used in this example.

trans-unit.source: Edit the pom.xml file and add the following code inside the section:
trans-unit.target: Edit the pom.xml file and add the following code inside the section:

trans-unit.source: This tells Maven that the project requires hbase-client version 0.98.4-hadoop2.
trans-unit.target: This tells Maven that the project requires hbase-client version 0.98.4-hadoop2.

trans-unit.source: At compile time, this will be downloaded from the default Maven repository.
trans-unit.target: At compile time, this will be downloaded from the default Maven repository.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <linkText>Maven Central Repository Search</linkText><title></title> to learn more about this dependency.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <linkText>Maven Central Repository Search</linkText><title></title> to learn more about this dependency.

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the pom.xml file. This must be inside the ... tags in the file, for example, between and .
trans-unit.target: Add the following code to the pom.xml file. This must be inside the ... tags in the file, for example, between and .

trans-unit.source: This configures a resource (conf\hbase-site.xml,) that contains configuration information for HBase.
trans-unit.target: This configures a resource (conf\hbase-site.xml,) that contains configuration information for HBase.

trans-unit.source: You can also set configuration values via code.
trans-unit.target: You can also set configuration values via code.

trans-unit.source: See the comments in the CreateTable example that follows for how to do this.
trans-unit.target: See the comments in the CreateTable example that follows for how to do this.

trans-unit.source: This also configures the <linkText>Maven Compiler Plugin</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Maven Shade Plugin</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: This also configures the <linkText>Maven Compiler Plugin</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>Maven Shade Plugin</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The compiler plug-in is used to compile the topology.
trans-unit.target: The compiler plug-in is used to compile the topology.

trans-unit.source: The shade plug-in is used to prevent license duplication in the JAR package that is built by Maven.
trans-unit.target: The shade plug-in is used to prevent license duplication in the JAR package that is built by Maven.

trans-unit.source: The reason this is used is that the duplicate license files cause an error at run time on the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The reason this is used is that the duplicate license files cause an error at run time on the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Using maven-shade-plugin with the ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer implementation prevents this error.
trans-unit.target: Using maven-shade-plugin with the ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer implementation prevents this error.

trans-unit.source: The maven-shade-plugin also produces an uber jar (or fat jar,) that contains all the dependencies required by the application.
trans-unit.target: The maven-shade-plugin also produces an uber jar (or fat jar,) that contains all the dependencies required by the application.

trans-unit.source: Save the pom.xml file.
trans-unit.target: Save the pom.xml file.

trans-unit.source: Create a new directory named conf in the hbaseapp directory.
trans-unit.target: Create a new directory named conf in the hbaseapp directory.

trans-unit.source: In the conf directory, create a new file named hbase-site.xml and use the following as the contents:
trans-unit.target: In the conf directory, create a new file named hbase-site.xml and use the following as the contents:

trans-unit.source: This file will be used to load the HBase configuration for an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This file will be used to load the HBase configuration for an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This is a very minimal hbase-site.xml file, and it contains the bare minimum settings for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This is a very minimal hbase-site.xml file, and it contains the bare minimum settings for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For a full version of the hbase-site.xml configuration file used by HDInsight, see <linkText>Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a full version of the hbase-site.xml configuration file used by HDInsight, see <linkText>Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure portal</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The hbase-site.xml file is located in the C:\apps\dist\hbase-<version number>-hadoop2\conf directory.
trans-unit.target: The hbase-site.xml file is located in the C:\apps\dist\hbase-<version number>-hadoop2\conf directory.

trans-unit.source: The version number portion of the file path will change as HBase is updated on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: The version number portion of the file path will change as HBase is updated on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Save the hbase-site.xml file.
trans-unit.target: Save the hbase-site.xml file.

trans-unit.source: Go to the hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory and rename the app.java file to CreateTable.java.
trans-unit.target: Go to the hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory and rename the app.java file to CreateTable.java.

trans-unit.source: Open the CreateTable.java file and replace the existing contents with the following:
trans-unit.target: Open the CreateTable.java file and replace the existing contents with the following:

trans-unit.source: This is the CreateTable class, which will create a table named people and populate it with some predefined users.
trans-unit.target: This is the CreateTable class, which will create a table named people and populate it with some predefined users.

trans-unit.source: Save the CreateTable.java file.
trans-unit.target: Save the CreateTable.java file.

trans-unit.source: In the hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory, create a new file named SearchByEmail.java.
trans-unit.target: In the hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples directory, create a new file named SearchByEmail.java.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: The SearchByEmail class can be used to query for rows by email address.
trans-unit.target: The SearchByEmail class can be used to query for rows by email address.

trans-unit.source: Because it uses a regular expression filter, you can provide either a string or a regular expression when using the class.
trans-unit.target: Because it uses a regular expression filter, you can provide either a string or a regular expression when using the class.

trans-unit.source: Save the SearchByEmail.java file.
trans-unit.target: Save the SearchByEmail.java file.

trans-unit.source: In the hbaseapp\src\main\hava\com\microsoft\examples directory, create a new file named DeleteTable.java.
trans-unit.target: In the hbaseapp\src\main\hava\com\microsoft\examples directory, create a new file named DeleteTable.java.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: This class is for cleaning up this example by disabling and dropping the table created by the CreateTable class.
trans-unit.target: This class is for cleaning up this example by disabling and dropping the table created by the CreateTable class.

trans-unit.source: Save the DeleteTable.java file.
trans-unit.target: Save the DeleteTable.java file.

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and change directories to the hbaseapp directory.
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and change directories to the hbaseapp directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the following command to build a JAR file that contains the application:
trans-unit.target: Use the following command to build a JAR file that contains the application:

trans-unit.source: This cleans any previous build artifacts, downloads any dependencies that have not already been installed, then builds and packages the application.
trans-unit.target: This cleans any previous build artifacts, downloads any dependencies that have not already been installed, then builds and packages the application.

trans-unit.source: When the command completes, the hbaseapp\target directory will contain a file named hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar.
trans-unit.target: When the command completes, the hbaseapp\target directory will contain a file named hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar.

trans-unit.source: The hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar file is an uber jar (sometimes called a fat jar,) which contains all the dependencies required to run the application.
trans-unit.target: The hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar file is an uber jar (sometimes called a fat jar,) which contains all the dependencies required to run the application.

trans-unit.source: There are many ways to upload a file to your HDInsight cluster, as described in <linkText>Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: There are many ways to upload a file to your HDInsight cluster, as described in <linkText>Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The following steps use <linkText>Azure PowerShell</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: The following steps use <linkText>Azure PowerShell</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: After installing and configuring Azure PowerShell, create a new file named hbase-runner.psm1.
trans-unit.target: After installing and configuring Azure PowerShell, create a new file named hbase-runner.psm1.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: This file contains two modules:
trans-unit.target: This file contains two modules:

trans-unit.source: Add-HDInsightFile - used to upload files to HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Add-HDInsightFile - used to upload files to HDInsight

trans-unit.source: Start-HBaseExample - used to run the classes created earlier
trans-unit.target: Start-HBaseExample - used to run the classes created earlier

trans-unit.source: Save the hbase-runner.psm1 file.
trans-unit.target: Save the hbase-runner.psm1 file.

trans-unit.source: Open a new Azure PowerShell window, change directories to the hbaseapp directory, and then run the following command.
trans-unit.target: Open a new Azure PowerShell window, change directories to the hbaseapp directory, and then run the following command.

trans-unit.source: Change the path to the location of the hbase-runner.psm1 file created earlier.
trans-unit.target: Change the path to the location of the hbase-runner.psm1 file created earlier.

trans-unit.source: This registers the module for this Azure PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: This registers the module for this Azure PowerShell session.

trans-unit.source: Use the following command to upload the hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar to your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Use the following command to upload the hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar to your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The command will then upload the hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar to the example/jars location in the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The command will then upload the hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar to the example/jars location in the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: After the files are uploaded, use the following code to create a new table using the hbaseapp:
trans-unit.target: After the files are uploaded, use the following code to create a new table using the hbaseapp:

trans-unit.source: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new table named people in your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This command creates a new table named people in your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command does not show any output in the console window.
trans-unit.target: This command does not show any output in the console window.

trans-unit.source: To search for entries in the table, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: To search for entries in the table, use the following command:

trans-unit.source: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command uses the SearchByEmail class to search for any rows where the contactinformation column family and the email column, contains the string contoso.com.
trans-unit.target: This command uses the SearchByEmail class to search for any rows where the contactinformation column family and the email column, contains the string contoso.com.

trans-unit.source: You should receive the following results:
trans-unit.target: You should receive the following results:

trans-unit.source: Using fabrikam.com for the -emailRegex value will return the users that have fabrikam.com in the email field.
trans-unit.target: Using fabrikam.com for the -emailRegex value will return the users that have fabrikam.com in the email field.

trans-unit.source: Since this search is implemented by using a regular expression-based filter, you can also enter regular expressions, such as ^r, which will return entries where the email begins with the letter 'r'.
trans-unit.target: Since this search is implemented by using a regular expression-based filter, you can also enter regular expressions, such as ^r, which will return entries where the email begins with the letter 'r'.

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the example, use the following command from the Azure PowerShell session to delete the people table used in this example:
trans-unit.target: When you are done with the example, use the following command from the Azure PowerShell session to delete the people table used in this example:

trans-unit.source: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace hdinsightclustername with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Use the -showErr parameter to view the standard error (STDERR) that is produced while running the job.
trans-unit.target: Use the -showErr parameter to view the standard error (STDERR) that is produced while running the job.
